mapper.insert: insert into GD_LIST(ID, PDNO, PD_BCATE, PD_MCATE, PD_SCATE, PD_NAME, PD_MAKER, PD_NARA, PD_SIZE, PD_COLOR, PD_INPR, PD_OUTPR, PD_LTCD, PD_IMAGE) values (#{ID}, #{PDNO}, #{PD_BCATE}, #{PD_MCATE}, #{PD_SCATE}, #{PD_NAME}, #{PD_MAKER}, #{PD_NARA}, #{PD_SIZE}, #{PD_COLOR}, #{PD_INPR}, #{PD_OUTPR}, #{PD_LTCD}, #{PD_IMAGE})
mapper.select: select count(*) from GD_LIST where PDNO=#{PDNO}
select * from Naming order by NAME_NM

select count(*) from GD_LIST
where PD_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select PDNO, PD_BCATE, PD_MCATE, PD_SCATE, PD_NAME, PD_MAKER, PD_NARA, PD_SIZE, PD_COLOR, PD_INPR, PD_OUTPR, PD_LTCD, PD_IMAGE from GD_LIST where PDNO=#{PDNO}
mapper.update: update GD_LIST set PDNO=#{PDNO}, PD_BCATE=#{PD_BCATE}, PD_MCATE=#{PD_MCATE}, PD_SCATE=#{PD_SCATE}, PD_NAME=#{PD_NAME}, PD_MAKER=#{PD_MAKER}, PD_NARA=#{PD_NARA}, PD_SIZE=#{PD_SIZE}, PD_COLOR=#{PD_COLOR}, PD_INPR=#{PD_INPR}, PD_OUTPR=#{PD_OUTPR}, PD_LTCD=#{PD_LTCD}, PD_IMAGE=#{PD_IMAGE}, PDDAY=sysdate where PDNO = #{PDNO}
mapper.insert: insert into DK_IMAGE(PDNO, fileName, uploadPath, uuid) values (#{PDNO}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: select * from DK_IMAGE where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\mm\dd')
